headline: UBS Maintains Neutral on Monster Beverage Despite Rising Aluminum Tariffs
summary: Monster Beverage Corporation (NASDAQ:MNST) ranks among the best FMCG stocks to buy. On June 16, UBS maintained its Neutral rating and $63 price target on Monster Beverage Corporation (NASDAQ:MNST), anticipating that higher aluminum tariffs will have a modest impact on the company’s margins beginning in the third quarter of 2025. At its annual shareholder meeting, […]
